item.title: Percona XtraDB using Private Registry Guide
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Deploy Percona XtraDB from private Docker registry KubeDB operator supports using private Docker registry. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run Percona XtraDB database using private Docker images. Before You Begin Read about PerconaXtraDBVersion to learn how it is used. You need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
